channel.title: Talking npcs?
channel.description:
how can i make it so that if i was to left click vannaka he would say something such as "would you like to go to the battle field" and then if you click continue you can click "yes" and "no"
i dont know anything about this kinda thing and its pretty much the only thing i need to learn, if you can explain then i will be very happy :D
